Name: Longsword - Tabletop Tactics
About the game: Longsword is a game of tabletop miniature combat. Assemble armies of miniature figurines, create the battlefield terrain of your dreams, and play turn-based tactical battles in solo campaigns, AI skirmishes, and online multiplayer! Unleash your creativity and share your creations with the world! Features: • Deep, Turn-based tabletop tactics made digital • Solo skirmish and Campaign modes to learn the game, and Multiplayer modes to test your skills against the world • Table Editor with Workshop integration to make your own tables and share them with the world • More than 250 Champions, Spells, Structures, and Legendary equipment cards • Hundreds of unique skills and conditions for incredible tactical depth • Free Demo!
